node.excerpt: At Vandebron we organize a two-day long Hackathon every quarter, and a colleague and I took this chance to dig into the wonderful world of GraalVM. I've first heard of GraalVM around two years ago when Oleg Šelajev toured through Java User Groups in…

frontmatter.title: Building native images and compiling with GraalVM and sbt

node.excerpt:
Hi! And welcome to my very first blog post.
